metadata.name: Dropping Of Password Filter DLL
metadata.comment: Detects dropping of dll files in system32 that may be used to retrieve user credentials from LSASS

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hklm\\\\system\\\\currentcontrolset\\\\control\\\\lsa')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('scecli\\\\0')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg add')))

output.summary: Detects dropping of dll files in system32 that may be used to retrieve user credentials from LSASS
